<!-- Multi-vendor Ecommerce Platform Project Instructions -->

## Project Overview
Multi-vendor ecommerce platform with:
- Laravel PHP Backend (Admin Panel & APIs)
- Flutter Mobile Apps (User, Seller, Delivery)
- Next.js Website Frontend
- POS System
- Multi-language & Multi-currency support
- Payment gateways: Google Pay, Apple Pay, Sampath Bank Sri Lanka IPG

## Completed Steps

## Project Structure
```
taiga/
├── backend/               # Laravel PHP Backend
├── mobile/               # Flutter Mobile Apps
│   ├── user_app/         # Customer App
│   ├── seller_app/       # Vendor/Seller App
│   └── delivery_app/     # Delivery Personnel App
├── website/              # Next.js Website Frontend
├── pos/                  # Point of Sale System
└── docs/                 # Documentation
```
